description: Detects a suspicious script executions from temporary folder
name: Suspicious Script Execution From Temp Folder
query: ((process.executable:(*\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe OR *\\mshta.exe OR *\\wscript.exe OR *\\cscript.exe) AND process.command_line:(*\\Windows\\Temp* OR *\\Temporary\ Internet* OR *\\AppData\\Local\\Temp* OR *\\AppData\\Roaming\\Temp* OR *%TEMP%* OR *%TMP%* OR *%LocalAppData%\\Temp*)) AND (NOT (process.command_line:(*\ >* OR *Out\-File* OR *ConvertTo\-Json* OR *\-WindowStyle\ hidden\ \-Verb\ runAs*))))
author: Florian Roth
Max Altgelt
